FunctionalRequirements.Name: Remote Patient Health Monitoring
FunctionalRequirements.Description: ALFRED must enable Mike to remotely monitor vital signs and health status of his patients, providing alerts for any significant changes to facilitate early intervention.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Secure Communication Channel
FunctionalRequirements.Description: ALFRED should provide a secure and encrypted communication channel for Mike to coordinate with patients and other healthcare providers, ensuring privacy and confidentiality.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Event Participation Support
FunctionalRequirements.Description: ALFRED must offer guidance and one-click join functionality for patients to participate in virtual social events, ensuring ease of use and technical support during the event.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Personalized Health Reminders
FunctionalRequirements.Description: ALFRED should allow patients like Thomas to set up and customize daily health reminders, while providing Mike with anonymized adherence data for oversight.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: High System Reliability
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: ALFRED must ensure high reliability in health monitoring and communication features, minimizing downtime to maintain continuous patient care.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Scalable Event Management
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: ALFRED should be capable of scaling to accommodate varying numbers of participants in virtual social events without performance degradation.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Adaptive User Interface
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: ALFRED must adapt its interface based on the user's technical ability and preferences, ensuring accessibility for older adults with varying levels of tech proficiency.
